note:
Writer, translator, book nerd, spoopy individual, an autumnal lifeform.

I am working on my MA thesis in translation studies and sitting on a mountain of my own creative writing, waiting for the moment to release those beasts into the world.

My interests include literature, languages (Latin!), history, nature, animals, classical music, plants, gardening, and vanishing into the woods one day, never to be seen again in human form.

Toots in English, Finnish and primordial shrieks.
